definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: The hexagonal pot shown in this picture is painted with five-colors and was put to auction at Sotheby's in the Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 畫上五色彩的六角盆圖片在荷蘭的蘇富比拍賣。

sentences.english: But Sotheby's argued that it would likely have ended up on the mainland even if it went to auction.
sentences.chinese: 但蘇富比認爲即使進行拍賣它也可能留在中國大陸。

sentences.english: Sotheby's Impressionist sale had a poor showing last week.
sentences.chinese: 蘇富比上週的印象派畫作拍賣表現疲軟。

sentences.english: An auction dedicated to master paintings by Zhang Daqian was held by Sotheby's Hong Kong on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 週二，香港蘇富比拍賣行舉行張大千畫專場拍賣。

sentences.english: Su Fu makes medium preview than be these curiosa now.
sentences.chinese: 蘇富比今日爲這些珍品作傳媒預展。

definition: sale price/negotiated price/price reached in an auction
Chang Dai-chien or Zhang Daqian (1899-1983), one of the greatest Chinese artists of the 20th century
collecting together (of distinguished people or exquisite objects)/to gather/to assemble
to value/to appraise/to be valued at/estimate/valuation
Austin or Austen (name)/Austin, Texas/also written 奧斯汀
Palace Museum, in the Forbidden City, Beijing/National Palace Museum, Taipei
